content: archived pdf http //web archive org/web/20101105022154/http //caron com/projects/br/br16s_brite_night_th pdf materials caron international s simply soft 100% acrylic 6 oz/170 g 330 yds/304 m #9727 black mc 3 skeins and caron international s simply soft brites * discontinued * 100% acrylic 6oz/170 g 330 yds/304 m #9610 grape a 1 skein #9606 lemonade b 1 skein #9608 blue mint c 1 skein #9609 berry blue d 1 skein #9603 papaya e 1 skein #9604 watermelon f 1 skein #9607 limelight g 1 skein #9605 mango h 1 skein crochet hook one size us h/8 5 mm or size to obtain gauge tapestry needle tn gauge granny square 3-3/4 *from the pattern * mix and match colors as desired for the squares finishing each square with a row of mc in single_crochet one 6 oz \ two 3 oz skein s of each cc is sufficient yardage to make the wrap alternating colors for the granny squares as shown it may be necessary to purchase additional yarn for predominate colors if working a more planned color sequence work 56 squares 28 square a 28 square b work border and add fringe to finish
